mapper.select: SELECT id, equipment_id, spare_part_id, quantity, created_at FROM equipment_spare_part WHERE equipment_id = #{equipmentId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, equipment_id, spare_part_id, quantity, created_at FROM equipment_spare_part WHERE spare_part_id = #{sparePartId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, equipment_id, spare_part_id, quantity, created_at FROM equipment_spare_part WHERE equipment_id = #{equipmentId} AND spare_part_id = #{sparePartId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO equipment_spare_part (equipment_id, spare_part_id, quantity) VALUES (#{equipmentId}, #{sparePartId}, #{quantity})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM equipment_spare_part WHERE equipment_id = #{equipmentId} AND spare_part_id = #{sparePartId}
